equipDesc.cn:
装备后，当队伍中任意干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动对其使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
 - <@tips.orange>用尽后恢复次数</>
equipDesc.en:
Once equipped, item is automatically used by any operator in the team who falls below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</> HP. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.
 - <@tips.orange>Uses are restored after depletion</>

equipExtraDesc.cn:
装备后，当队伍中任意干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动对其使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
<@tips.orange>用尽后恢复次数</>：战斗中的可用次数用尽时，一段时间后会恢复<@ba.vup>1</>次可用次数。
equipExtraDesc.en:
Once equipped, item is automatically used by any operator in the team who falls below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</> HP. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.
<@tips.orange>Uses are restored after depletion</>: When uses are depleted in battle, <@ba.vup>1</> more use becomes available after a while.

装备后，当队伍中任意干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动对其使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
 - <@tips.orange>用尽后恢复次数</>

<@tips.orange>Uses are restored after depletion</>: When uses are depleted in battle, <@ba.vup>1</> more use becomes available after a while.

equipDesc.cn:
装备后，当持有干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
 - <@tips.purple>支援主控干员</>
 - <@tips.orange>用尽后恢复次数</>
equipDesc.en:
Once equipped, item is automatically used if the holder's HP drops below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.
 - <@tips.purple>Can support the controlled operator</>
 - <@tips.orange>Uses are restored after depletion</>

equipExtraDesc.cn:
装备后，当持有干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
<@tips.purple>支援主控干员</>：每场战斗仅<@ba.vup>1</>次，当主控干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动对其使用。
<@tips.orange>用尽后恢复次数</>：战斗中的可用次数用尽时，一段时间后会恢复<@ba.vup>1</>次可用次数。
equipExtraDesc.en:
Once equipped, item is automatically used if the holder falls below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</> HP. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.
<@tips.purple>Can support the controlled operator</>: Only <@ba.vup>1</> time per battle. Item is automatically used on the controlled operator if they fall below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</> HP.
<@tips.orange>Uses are restored after depletion</>: When use attempts are depleted during battle, <@ba.vup>1</> more use becomes available after a while.

equipDesc.cn: 装备后，当队伍中有其他干员陷入无法战斗状态时自动对其使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
equipDesc.en: Once equipped, item is automatically used by any operator in the team who gets a debuff. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.

equipExtraDesc.en: Once equipped, item is automatically used by any operator in the team who gets a debuff. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.

equipDesc.cn: 装备后，当队伍中有其他干员陷入无法战斗状态时自动对其使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
equipDesc.en: Once equipped, item is automatically used by any operator in the team who gets a debuff. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.

equipExtraDesc.cn: 装备后，当队伍中有其他干员陷入无法战斗状态时自动对其使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
equipExtraDesc.en: Once equipped, item is automatically used by any operator in the team who gets a debuff. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.

equipDesc.cn:
装备后，当持有干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
 - <@tips.purple>支援主控干员</>
 - <@tips.orange>用尽后恢复次数</>
equipDesc.en:
Once equipped, item is automatically used if the holder's HP drops below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.
 - <@tips.purple>Can support the controlled operator</>
 - <@tips.orange>Uses are restored after depletion</>

equipExtraDesc.cn:
装备后，当持有干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
<@tips.purple>支援主控干员</>：每场战斗仅<@ba.vup>1</>次，当主控干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动对其使用。
<@tips.orange>用尽后恢复次数</>：战斗中的可用次数用尽时，一段时间后会恢复<@ba.vup>1</>次可用次数。
equipExtraDesc.en:
Once equipped, item is automatically used if the holder falls below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</> HP. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.
<@tips.purple>Can support the controlled operator</>: Only <@ba.vup>1</> time per battle. Item is automatically used on the controlled operator if they fall below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</> HP.
<@tips.orange>Uses are restored after depletion</>: When use attempts are depleted during battle, <@ba.vup>1</> more use becomes available after a while.

Once equipped, item is automatically used by any operator in the team who falls below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</> HP. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.
 - <@tips.orange>Uses are restored after depletion</>

equipExtraDesc.cn:
装备后，当队伍中任意干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动对其使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
<@tips.orange>用尽后恢复次数</>：战斗中的可用次数用尽时，一段时间后会恢复<@ba.vup>1</>次可用次数。
equipExtraDesc.en:
Once equipped, item is automatically used by any operator in the team who falls below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</> HP. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.
<@tips.orange>Uses are restored after depletion</>: When uses are depleted in battle, <@ba.vup>1</> more use becomes available after a while.

equipDesc.cn:
装备后，当持有干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
 - <@tips.purple>支援主控干员</>
 - <@tips.orange>用尽后恢复次数</>
equipDesc.en:
Once equipped, item is automatically used if the holder's HP drops below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.
 - <@tips.purple>Can support the controlled operator</>
 - <@tips.orange>Uses are restored after depletion</>

equipExtraDesc.cn:
装备后，当持有干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动使用，单场战斗中最多可用<@ba.vup>{count:0}</>次。
<@tips.purple>支援主控干员</>：每场战斗仅<@ba.vup>1</>次，当主控干员生命值低于<@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</>时自动对其使用。
<@tips.orange>用尽后恢复次数</>：战斗中的可用次数用尽时，一段时间后会恢复<@ba.vup>1</>次可用次数。
equipExtraDesc.en:
Once equipped, item is automatically used if the holder falls below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</> HP. Max uses per battle: <@ba.vup>{count:0}</>.
<@tips.purple>Can support the controlled operator</>: Only <@ba.vup>1</> time per battle. Item is automatically used on the controlled operator if they fall below <@ba.vup>{param1:0%}</> HP.
<@tips.orange>Uses are restored after depletion</>: When use attempts are depleted during battle, <@ba.vup>1</> more use becomes available after a while.

 - <@tips.orange>用尽后恢复次数</>
